article: Mr. Black works in a hospital in a town. He is a good  doctor  , and people in the town like him very much. He is very  _  to his patients ,  _  many people like to ask him for help. One day, Mr. Black gets to the hospital and  find  a fat woman in the waiting room. He calls her to his office and asks," What's  wrong  with you?,madam?""It's my birthday today, sir"says the woman."My husband "  _  me a present . But I can't go in it." "It doesn't matter, madam," says Mr. Black. "You  should  lose some weight ".Then, you can go in  _  your coat." "You are  _  ,doctor, says the woman. "He buys me not a coat, but a  _  !
